VehicleAssetEmssnSrc.name: VehicleAssetEmssnSrc
VehicleAssetEmssnSrc.description: Represents assets that are mobile in nature, use energy that can be recorded, and are the source of greenhouse gas emissions.

AccountNameId.description: Name of the company, it's subsidiary, or it's business unit for which you are doing carbon accounting.

BusinessRegion.description: The business region where this asset is located.

City.description: The city where this asset is located.

Country.description: The country where this asset is located.

CrbnEmssnScopeAlloc.description: The carbon emissions scope allocation record to override default scope assignments for all the fuel types.

FleetVehicleType.description: Specifies the type of fleet vehicle.

IsCompanyOwnedAsset.description: Indicates whether the vehicle is owned by your company (true) or not (false). Vehicle ownership by the company impacts the scope allocation of associated emissions.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LeaseExpirationDate.description: The date when the lease of the vehicle expires.

LeaseIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier for the vehicle lease.

OtherEmssnFctrId.description: The other emissions factor set record thatâ€™s associated with the vehicle.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ParentEmissionSourceId.description: The parent asset that stores the aggregated emissions data of all the related assets.

PostalCode.description: The postal code of this asset.

State.description: The state where this asset is located.

StreetAddress.description: The street address where this asset is located.

StreetAddress2.description: The second line of the street address where this asset is located.

VehicleIdentifier.description: The unique external identifier for the vehicle.

VehicleType.description: The type of vehicle. The type of vehicle impacts emission calculations.
